DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study demonstrate POLARSTEM™ Ti/HA cumulative femoral stem revision rate 10 year . The secondary purpose study provide 10 year safety effectiveness data POLARSTEM™ Ti/HA term radiographic clinical performance
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter retrospective longterm clinical outcome study conduct 6 hospital France . 502 subject undergone THA POLARSTEM™ 2002 2005 enrol study clinical radiographically follow least 10 year . Subjects reach 10-year post surgery timepoint invite 10-year post-operative follow-up visit obtain clinical radiographic outcome measure .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject require receive primary total hip arthroplasty 2002 2005 . 2 . Subject receive POLARSTEM™ Ti/HA unilateral bilateral , due severe hip joint damage result arthrosis , degenerative disease , traumatic event , inflammatory rheumatoid process . 3 . Subject receive noncemented POLARSYSTEM ( POLARSTEM™ Ti/HA combination POLARCUP™ ) . 4 . Subject age 18 75 time surgery . 5 . Signed Informed Consent ( ICF ) . 1 .
